info.name: Somber Cosmos - Mush Theme
info.description: This theme gives Mush a more serious and darker tone and removes unnecessary junk.
info.additionalInfo:
I've always disliked the vivid blue, girly colours of Mush, so I made a theme that would change the appearance of the game to suit my taste. Realising that I might be not the only one who feels that way, I've decided to release it to the public. Enjoy!

Version 1.02:

- Supports French version
- Minor button adjustment

Version 1.01: 

- Death screen colour adjustments

Version 1.0 Release Notes:

- Removed tips from the Tips Section in chat window (Now Only General Announcements appear there.)
- Removed "Activate Gold" banner from character picture (Bronze members.)
- Removed Flashing character level indicator
- Removed Logo
- Removed Bottom banners (As a result, main window scroll is non existant on Full HD screens.) 
- Removed Help Icon

- Added new background
- Added new main window design elements
- Added new alert animation
- Added new button appearance

Known bugs: 
Login screen buttons appear not like they should.
